plays.text: Penalty to Ivan Novoseltsev 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Gionta
Penalty to Lance Ward 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Sergei Brylin assisted by Scott Niedermayer and Brian Rafalski
Penalty to Ivan Majesky 2 minutes for Hooking Brian Gionta
Penalty to Jim McKenzie 5 minutes for Fighting Peter Worrell
Penalty to Peter Worrell 5 minutes for Fighting Jim McKenzie
Penalty to Jim McKenzie 10 minutes for Misconduct Peter Worrell served by Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Marcus Nilson unassisted
Penalty to Sergei Brylin 2 minutes for Hooking Igor Ulanov
Penalty to Christian Berglund 2 minutes for Slashing Jaroslav Bednar
Penalty to Ryan Johnson 2 minutes for Slashing Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Roughing Lance Ward
Penalty to Lance Ward 2 minutes for High Sticking Colin White served by Juraj Kolnik
Penalty to Lance Ward 2 minutes for Roughing Colin White
Goal scored by Branislav Mezei assisted by Viktor Kozlov
Penalty to Peter Worrell 2 minutes for Roughing Christian Berglund
Penalty to Brian Gionta 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Kristian Huselius
Penalty to Ivan Novoseltsev 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
